dt-example.title: FixedColumns integration
dt-example.info:
This example is the same as the [basic SearchList example](./basic.html) one, but with [FixedColumns for DataTables](https://datatables.net/extensions/fixedcolumns) and scrolling enabled.
As you will see in the example below FixedColumns will make one or more columns "sticky" at the start or end of the table. This can be useful for very wide tables when you want certain columns to always be available for the end user.
